summary: A film about the life and work of the cosmologist, Stephen Hawking, who despite his near total paralysis, was one of the great minds of all time.
cast: Isobel Hawking|Stephen Hawking|Janet Humphrey|Mary Hawking|Basil King|Derek Powney|Norman Dix|Robert Berman|Gordon Berry|Roger Penrose|Dennis Sciama|John Wheeler|Brandon Carter|John Taylor|Kip Thorne|Don Page|Christopher Isham|Brian Whitt|Raymond Laflamme
title: A Brief History of Time
